content: ISRG is the ticker.  6 -12 mos.  Bear. catalysts.

args.query: ISRG (Intuitive Surgical) next 6-12 months bear case catalysts: upcoming earnings dates, guidance risks, valuation metrics, recent segment trends, regulatory/recall issues, competitive landscape (Medtronic Hugo, J&J Ottava), procedure volume sensitivity, China/VBP impacts, hospital capex and system placements, key risks flagged in latest 10-Q/10-K, recent news

llmSummary: financial_search(query=ISRG (Intuitive Surgical) next 6-12 months bear case catalysts...) -> Key bear case risks for ISRG over the next 6-12 months include rich valuation (P/E 68.5, PEG 12.9 as of 2024), modest revenue/earnings growth (~5% YoY), intensifying competition (Medtronic Hugo, J&J Ottava), hospital capex/system placement sensitivity, China/VBP policy impacts, and the potential for negative guidance or recall news; recent headlines (2025-2026) also indicate competitive and sentiment risks.
